action-success.author: Walt Disney
action-success.quote: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

action-success.author: Dr. Henry Link
action-success.quote: We generate fears while we sit. We overcome them by action.

action-success.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe
action-success.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Wishing is not enough; we must do.

action-success.author: John Wooden
action-success.quote: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.

action-success.author: Michael Jordan
action-success.quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life, and that is why I succeed.

action-success.author: Thomas Jefferson
action-success.quote: Never put off until tomorrow what you can do today.

action-success.author: Steve Jobs
action-success.quote: The greatest hazard in life is to risk nothing.

action-success.author: Teddy Roosevelt
action-success.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.

action-success.author: W. Clement Stone
action-success.quote: Thinking will not overcome fear, but action will.

action-success.author: George Henry Lewes
action-success.quote: The only cure for grief is action.

action-success.author: Thomas Jefferson
action-success.quote: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.

action-success.author: Tony Robbins
action-success.quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.

action-success.author: Joan Baez
action-success.quote: Action is the antidote to despair.

action-success.author: Dale Carnegie
action-success.quote: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.

action-success.author: Steve Maraboli
action-success.quote: The universe doesn't give you what you ask for with your thoughts; it gives you what you demand with your actions.

action-success.author: Winston Churchill
action-success.quote: Success is Not Final, Failure is Not Fatal: it is the Courage to Continue that Counts.

action-success.author: Muhammad Ali
action-success.quote: Don't Count the Days, Make the Days Count.

action-success.author: Muhammad Ali
action-success.quote: He Who is Not Courageous Enough to Take Risks Will Accomplish Nothing in Life.

action-success.author: George Bernard Shaw
action-success.quote: Don't Wait for Opportunity, Create it.

action-success.author: Jim Rohn
action-success.quote: Either Run the Day or the Day Runs You.

action-success.author: Unknown
action-success.quote: When You Feel Like Quitting, Remember Why You Started.

action-success.author: Unknown
action-success.quote: Great Things Never Come From Comfort Zones.

action-success.author: Denis Waitley
action-success.quote: The Real Risk is Doing Nothing.

action-success.author: Winston Churchill
action-success.quote: Success is Walking from Failure to Failure.

action-success.author: Pablo Picasso
action-success.quote: Action is the Foundational Key to Success.

action-success.author: Lewis Carroll
action-success.quote: In the End We Only Regret the Chances We Didn't Take.

action-success.author: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson
action-success.quote: Success isn't Always about Greatness. It's about Consistency.

action-success.author: Bobby Unser
action-success.quote: Success is Where Preparation & Opportunity Meet.

action-success.author: Woody Allen
action-success.quote: 80% of Success is Showing Up.

action-success.author: St. Augustine
action-success.quote: God provides the wind, but man must raise the sails.
